itunes:title: Episode 315 - DB Sports Companion Show 09/11/18 - Special Guest Freddie "Fredex" Mitchell
title: Episode 315 - DB Sports Companion Show 09/11/18 - Special Guest Freddie "Fredex" Mitchell
itunes:author: Tetherball Academy Media
itunes:subtitle: Ross Patterson and Dan Hollaway are live from Philly at the Eagles home opener with special guest Philadelphia legend Freddie Mitchell in one of the wildest interviews you will ever hear an NFL player give.  This one had everything-- jello shots, 6 membe...
itunes:summary:
Ross Patterson and Dan Hollaway are live from Philly at the Eagles home opener with special guest Philadelphia legend Freddie Mitchell in one of the wildest interviews you will ever hear an NFL player give.  This one had everything-- jello shots, 6 members from stadium security show up, a hot lady detective on the show and some members from DB PA Chapter. Crazy episode.

Buy the Audiobook for "When Darkness Falls, He Doesn't Catch It" https://www.amazon.com/When-Darkness-Falls-Doesnt-Catch/dp/B07H5P5BY7/ref=tmm_aud_swatch_0?_encoding=UTF8&qid=1533268712&sr=1-1
